After Hours Emergencies: 9-1-1 or  979.732.2388
City Manager
Donald Warschak Office: 979.732.2366 x 223 Email the City Manager

The City Manager is responsible for the day-to-day operation of the City.  All departments, with the exception of Municipal Court, are directly under the authority of the City Manager. The City Manager also serves in the capacity of City Treasurer, Investment Officer, Purchasing Agent, Emergency Management Coordinator, Floodplain Administrator, Zoning Code Enforcement Officer, and Health Officer. Fraud Detection & Prevention

City Secretary
Bana Schneider Office: 979.732.2366 x 224 Email the City Secretary The City Secretary is responsible for maintaining official city records, including minutes of City Council meetings, appointments for boards and commissions, public bids, and contracts. In addition, the Secretary is responsible for conducting official City elections. The City Secretary is also the City's Finance Director, Records Management Officer and Secretary of the Planning & Zoning Commission.
Assistant City Secretary/HR Manager
Dinah Jacobs Office: 979.732.2366 x 225 Email the Assistant City Secretary The Assistant City Secretary provides support for the City Secretary.
